recommended_degree: Teknik Mesin, Teknik Elektro, Teknik Kimia (Sarjana)
job_description: The intern will support the Technical Division in various operational and engineering activities across areas such as Technical Area, IPAL, Utility, and Technical Maintenance. Responsibilities include assisting in routine inspections, monitoring machine or system performance, documenting operational findings, and supporting troubleshooting activities under supervision. The intern will also help prepare technical reports, update maintenance records, and participate in improvement initiatives to enhance reliability, efficiency, and safety within the assigned technical units.
